name: dreamfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you sleep dreamfully, you have many dreams while you sleep: sleep dreamfully If you are conscious of the fact that you are sleeping dreamfully, you can't really be asleep. The men slept dreamfully under the starry sky. Opposite
dreamlessly
in a way that is like a dream, especially a pleasant dream: She felt dreamfully contented and comfortable. We sat gazing dreamfully into each other's eyes. Synonym
dreamily
More examplesFewer examplesI dozed restlessly and dreamfully for a few hours."What am I doing here?" he asked dreamfully.The waves washed dreamfully over her bare feet.He stood at the window looking dreamfully at the clouds.Two swans sailed dreamfully over the water.
